show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

header.title: The Lived World of Place and Urban Design

title: The Lived World of Place and Urban Design
content: The Lived World of Place and Urban Design — a talk with David Seamon, editor of the journal Environmental &... <!--more--> Architectural Phenomenology, about relational dynamics between humans  and their built environment; also featuring Mindy Fullilove, author of Root Shock and Urban Alchemy about the destructive effects of post-war urban renewal projects on African-American communities and about how we can restore joy to “our fragmented cities”; arch.ksu.edu/seamon/EAP; poem by Mary Oliver
